title: HOUSE OF ILL FAME IN BAMBALAPITIYA RAIDED: MANAGER, 5 WOMEN ARRESTED
content: A house of ill fame in Bambalapitiya was raided last night and six persons including five women were arrested. “The manager of the ‘house’ is also among the arrested and the women, aged between 23 and 40, are residents of Ratmalana, Veyangoda, Padaviya, Dambulla and Anuradhapura,” said the Walana Central Corruption Prevention Unit….
